a person or organization legally chosen to work alone or as part of a group to manage money or property for others: The pension fund is managed by a 12-member board of trustees. The CEO, who is responsible for developing overall strategy, reports to a board of trustees. She was invited to become a trustee for her local wildlife charity. See also
